column4: I install my acer driver then it again not working and also it show my message like this >> This driver is active but not currently in use.
Does any one have idea how I fix this.
please help me!
Thats the hardware you have, not the driver name.
: but i see that name of back of my laptop!
It is still the name of the wifi chipset and NOT the driver name.
: do you have any advice, how i find my driver name.
First, please just read the links you've been given.
: i found on that link that my wifdriver not supported :-- 14e4:4322 no BCM4322
:  no means not support.
do you have any idea what should i do now?
Which link exactly told you that?
: and i found this on this page :- http://www.linuxwireless.org/en/users/Drivers/b43#Supported_devices
Then read that link again please, since it clearly states that the BCM4322 is supported.
And I have no clue why you think your wifi chipset is "BCM4322", because your pastebin of lspci doesnt detect that at all.
: but my acer laptop already include that wifi driver.
: my acer laptop is TRAVEL MATE 4740
That may be. Still your pastebin doesnt tell anything about BCM4322. Pastebin the output of lspci -k please.
: ok i will .
: here the output http://paste.ubuntu.com/1089589/
As you can see in lines 45-47, you have a BCM4358, which uses the "wl" driver.
ok .
: but it found wifi point in win-7  but how i manage in ubuntu
